<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Graceful Poise](/Feats.aspx?ID=4848) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=601" />
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=152" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 150 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Double Slice](/Feats.aspx?ID=4769)

</column>

---

With the right positioning, your off-hand weapon can strike like a scorpion’s stinger. While you are in this stance, if you make your second Strike from Double Slice with an agile weapon, Double Slice counts as one attack when calculating your multiple attack penalty
name: Graceful Poise
